channel.title: How can i stop auto loggers like all them loggins how can i stop it?
channel.description: how do i stop them autocrashers entering my server so when they come they cant do that please tell me my server is off i cant run it cause of that.

item.title: How can i stop auto loggers like all them loggins how can i stop it?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Iterate through all players to see if the connection already exist from that IP and if another connection comes from the same IP terminate it, others wouldn’t iterate, because there is a better way.

If they keep attempting to connect, it will temporarily ban them from entering the server(5 to 15 minutes, IP Ban). Though you have to make it, it’s simple.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i stop auto loggers like all them loggins how can i stop it?

ok, if u have a backup, let em crash it. wait a half hour, and run the backup. they will probably get bored and leave

item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
